00011 // mirror.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Mirror Class Declarations
00015 class Mirror : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // Mirror Public Methods
00018         Mirror(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > r, Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00019                 Kr = r;
00020                 bumpMap = bump;
00021         }
00022         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00023 private:
00024         // Mirror Private Data
00025         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kr;
00026         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap;
00027 };
00028 // Mirror Method Definitions
00029 BSDF *Mirror::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom, const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00030         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00031         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00032         if (bumpMap)
00033                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00034         else
00035                 dgs = dgShading;
00036         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00037         Spectrum R = Kr->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00038         if (!R.Black())
00039                 bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(SpecularReflection)(R,
00040                         BSDF_ALLOC(FresnelNoOp)()));
00041         return bsdf;
00042 }
00043 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00044                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00045         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kr = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kr", Spectrum(1.f));
00046         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00047         return new Mirror(Kr, bumpMap);
00048 }
